summary: TensorFlow implementation of the DeiT (Data-efficient Image Transformers) architecture tailored for image classification tasks, providing a ready-to-use model that can be fine‑tuned or directly applied to visual data.
business_intent: Enable developers and data scientists to integrate a state‑of‑the‑art transformer‑based vision model into applications such as object recognition, content tagging, and automated image analysis, accelerating deployment of accurate image classification solutions.
